name: Stress Maze
description:
Wowie GameJam 3.0 "Failing Is Progress"
In this game you move through a dungeon maze and when you get hit you gain more stats.

Encouraged to use Full Screen.

I have used https://codemanu.itch.io/pixelart-effect-pack and https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii check them out they are great!

I kinda had to rush this jam i hope results are fun to play :)
Have fun
